header.title: All aboard!
header.description: Welcome to the Coding Train with Daniel Shiffman! A community dedicated to learning creative coding with beginner-friendly tutorials and projects on YouTube and more.

newToCoding.title: New to coding?
newToCoding.description: All aboard! Welcome to all beginners and code-curious individuals ready for a coding journey of self-expression and play.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.description: Streamline your learning experience and ride a Track on The Coding Train. Tracks are sequenced video tutorials that you can follow like a course syllabus.

tracksCta.text: Ready to learn? Try a track for beginners and more!

challenges.title: Challenges
challenges.description: Watch Daniel take on Coding Challenge projects in p5.js and Processing. The challenge topics range from algorithmic art, machine learning, simulation, to generative poetry, and more.

challengesCta.text: ready to explore? try a challenge!

events.title: Events
events.noEventsDescription: Keep your eye out for events in the future!

upcoming.title: Wave Function Collapse Video Premiere!
upcoming.description: Straight out of quantum mechanics, Wave Function Collapse is an algorithm for procedural generation of images.

support.title: Support
support.description: Support the Coding Train and and enjoy some perks!
